## Prerequisites

```bash
python >= 3.8
pip >= 21.0
```

## Installation

1. Clone the repository:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/username/awesome-llm-apps.git
cd awesome-llm-apps
```

2. Navigate to the project directory:

```bash
cd [project_directory]
```

3. Install dependencies:

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```
